title: Swap Who We Are section image to dr-banner.jpg (Utthan Clinic)

requirements.summary: Replace the Who We Are section (alt exactly "Dr. Roshani Mansuriya - Utthan Physiotherapy Clinic") source to use the uploaded dr-banner.jpg without changing any layout/CSS or alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: The image rendered by the with alt="Dr. Roshani Mansuriya - Utthan Physiotherapy Clinic" (in frontend/src/components/home/WhoWeAreSection.tsx) displays dr-banner.jpg instead of the previous asset.
No Tailwind classes, layout structure, or surrounding markup are changed (CSS behavior remains as-is).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded dr-banner.jpg to the public assets directory so it can be referenced by the existing without changing layout/CSS.
Update only the targeted src (currently pointing at /assets/image.png) to point at /assets/dr-banner.jpg; do not change the alt text, Tailwind classes, or surrounding markup/layout.
